titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Railroad Stock Certificate Collection, 1857-1970 AIS.2015.06
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Miriam Meislik.

editionstmt.p: Railroads Stock certificates Railroad companies Business and Industry Transportation

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-06-17T09:33-0400

did.unittitle: Railroad Stock Certificate Collection
did.abstract: This collection contains 51 stock certificates dating from 1857 to 1970 documenting the history of railroads in western Pennsylvania. Also included are various items such as correspondence, bills of lading, telegrams, valuation of baggage tickets, dividend check, a lease, and employee transit passes for the Pennsylvania Railroad Lines West of Pittsburgh.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Fifty-one stock certificates dating from 1857 to 1970 documenting the history of railroads in western Pennsylvania. Also included are various items such as correspondence, bills of lading, telegrams, valuation of baggage tickets, dividend check, a lease, and employee transit passes for the Pennsylvania Railroad Lines West of Pittsburgh.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Ken Kobus on June 2015.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Stock certificates are arranged chronologically accordingto railroad division. Additonal manuscript items are arranged by item type and date.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: Something about history of the railroads is to go here. Will be supplied by Ken Kobus

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Railroad Stock Certificate Collection, AIS.2015.06, 1857-1970, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh
